channel.title: Please Help I Need A Tut Or Somebody To Help Me Fix My Stats
channel.description:
Hey :) Ive Tried Searching The Forums But I Cant Find It I Know Theres A Tut Or SOMETHING Out There
Ok This Is My Problem When I Level On Testscape My Stats Stay The Level They Were But When I Log Out They Refresh Its Hard To Explain
For Example My Stats Are Bugged Like 200/99 HOW DO I MAKE IT SAY 200/200 :confused: :mad:
PLEASE HELP IT WOULD BE MUCH APPRECIATED

item.title: Please Help I Need A Tut Or Somebody To Help Me Fix My Stats
item.dc:creator: @Billys_Java Billys Java
item.description:
@Billys_Java wrote:

well to make it say 200/200 you should go into client.java and search for 300.0

and after a while you will see something that has a 200 at the top and a 200 at the bottom. So all you do is change the 300.0 in the second one to 400 and leave the 200’s the same and save compile and run. There ya go it should fix that unless you have it another way it might say 99 instead of 200. That is what it looks like to me. Im going to download a source in a minute and try to help in a better way by explaining more…

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help I Need A Tut Or Somebody To Help Me Fix My Stats
